mapper.select: select sa.* from sys_user su left join sys_role_user sru on su.id = sru.user_id left join sys_role_acl sra on sru.role_id = sra.role_id left join sys_acl sa on sra.acl_id = sa.id where su.username = #{username}
select sa.* from sys_role_acl sra left join sys_acl sa on sra.acl_id = sa.id where sra.role_id = #{roleId}
